snippet.title: Heroes of the Seven Islands - WISHLIST ON STEAM - updated trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010290/Heroes_of_the_Seven_Islands

A hand-drawn tribute to classic role-playing video games and comic books. Heroes of the Seven Islands is a comfy yet challenging non-linear standalone heroic adventure with side quests in a vast light fairy tale world, inspired by 90s games.

Released in March 2025
